alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:16PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central La Plata County through 545 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Durango, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central La Plata County, including the following locations... Tacoma, Hermosa and Trimble. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 27 and 38. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 75 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
